tests.name: Serum Creatinine
tests.description: Measures muscle waste; high levels suggest poor kidney filtering.

tests.name: Protein in Urine
tests.description: Detects kidney damage from protein leakage.

tests.name: Albumin-to-Creatinine Ratio (ACR)
tests.description: Measures albumin leakage; high ACR = kidney stress.

tests.name: Fasting Blood Sugar
tests.description: Measures blood sugar levels after fasting.

tests.name: HbA1c
tests.description: Averages blood sugar over 2–3 months; critical for diabetes monitoring.

tests.name: Sodium
tests.description: Controls fluid balance and nerve function.

tests.name: Phosphorus
tests.description: Works with calcium; rises in advanced CKD.

tests.name: LDL (“Bad” Cholesterol)
tests.description: Contributes to plaque buildup in arteries.

tests.name: Hemoglobin (Hb)
tests.description: Measures oxygen-carrying red blood cells; low levels may indicate anemia.
